attributes.action: Stop employers from unnecessarily requiring job applicants to have a drivers license.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We're constantly told via the news and other formats that using public transport is the key to lowering congestion and helping the environment.  Employers are no longer allowed to discriminate based on race, religion, sex etc, so why are they allowed to discriminate against non-drivers?  We call on the prime minister to recognise that where driving is not essential to the job, it should not be a requirement for application.
